nodes.text: Venestria was an astronomical object located in the Venestria system, a part of the Clacis sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It lay on the Braxant Run hyperlane between the Muunilinst and Kwevron systems, and another hyperspace route linked it to the Cezith system.

Venestria was the origin point of the art form known as Venestrian poetry. At some point during the Clone Wars of 22 BBY to 19 BBY, the father of the future Imperial stormtrooper Isila Drutch served with the navy of the Galactic Republic at a confrontation at Venestria. In her memoirs, written in 33 ABY, Drutch mentioned her father's participation in the action at Venestria. Venestria fell within the borders of the Pentastar Alignment between 4 ABY and 12 ABY.
Venestria was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square K-4.
